website_summaries.verdict: This reliable electric hole punch doubles as a stapler.
pros: View window on the chip catcher helps you see when it's full
Designed to handle 24 sheets of paper at once
Quiet operation won't disturb a classroom setting
cons: Best for a workroom rather than something to keep on your desk

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch!  Just furious about this...
customer_reviews.text: ...MISLEADING LISTING. Based mostly on the photograph of the item I purchased it. When it arrived it was not the item shown in the photograph. What I received instead is the GBC hole punch - WITHOUT THE STAPLER. Apparently, now that I have read the reviews I am not the first person this bait and switch has happened to. This is my second experience since July that an item has had misleading listing information and photographs. Amazon! Get your act together and do the right thing by your customers.
customer_reviews.author: merchantlink

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: I got replacement for original purchase, but after few month, not Working. Update: Strong Recommendation: "DO NOT BUY", Got replacement, working ok for few month, had problems again, emailed seller but no reply. This is Paper Punch is just waste of Money... Never buying ACCO Brands
customer_reviews.author: usa365

customer_reviews.title: workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar item which lasted six years or so before the punching mechanism stopped working. It was used in a work environment and held up very well for what we put it though. With the new replacement unit, we are experiencing some unusual noises while punching but it hasn't actually broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Solid but Huge
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid hole puncher that can tackle a good number of sheets at once and punch both three holes on the binding side and two holes on top, which is what I was really looking for. However, be warned, it is huge. It takes up a tremendous amount of space for a hole puncher,
customer_reviews.author: Ravishingr

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this machine to replace one just like it. Used it for many years without any issues. This is used in a school setting, so it gets used constantly. You will be please if you purchase this machine and will get years of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Veach

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: For a Law Office, I saw it, ordered it, and it does NOT have the stapler, I absolutely HATE it when companies do this. Show me the picture of the item, not one that will help you sell more. I am so tempted to send it back and never order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Time saving!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutelt love this paper puncher. One office machine to do 2 and 3 hole punches. Less time, more space, consistent application etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mccat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small office jobs!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 15 year old one with this one and was amazed in the improvements! We frequently put together proposals and thus does the job as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: The paper punch would be perfect if the holes were just slightly deeper into the ...
customer_reviews.text: The paper punch would be perfect if the holes were just slightly deeper into the paper (too close to the edge), but overall I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: lobob

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my wife an electric 3-hole punch for her home office. This thing is larger than a small printer. We havent used it, because there is not enough room on our desk for it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allison Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home
customer_reviews.text: Does 3 hole and 2 hole punching.... Really increases home office productivity. I have one just like this at work, and it gets a lot of use, so I believe it will prove very durable at home.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ(ret) Randall K. Faulkner, USA

customer_reviews.title: I am a teacher and I keep a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and I keep a lot of records and student work so this REALLY came in handy!
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but very big.
customer_reviews.text: This item works well and can punch approx 25 pages at a time. Only thing is its huge. It takes up a lot of space on my desk. Wish it was more compact.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.Rice

customer_reviews.title: Too big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: This machine works good but it's huge and takes up a ton of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Great For Classroom Use
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product two months, but it is a wonderful addition to my classroom. The fact that it punches up to 24 sheets of paper effortlessly and without sound or disruption to the classroom is certainly a plus. My sixth grade students love the convenience of it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayakblue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the many times that I have to use this throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Yanni S.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in October 2009: It's a 2/3 electric hole puncher. It does exactly that. Just wish the holes were a tad further away from the paper edge. Also, when punching, only punch 15 or so pages, don't go to the max of 22!
customer_reviews.author: Kindly

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Hole punch is not set at proper distance from sheet edge. It is too close. It will do for now. After several years, it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: william seaman

customer_reviews.title: but the warranty is quite good hence the 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: i have few of these, and they break quite often, but the warranty is quite good hence the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: This was a replacement for a previous owned same paper ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a previous owned same paper punch, but does not seem as powerful or quick as our original one. Still works, just not as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Crotty

customer_reviews.title: Hole Puch is Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is awesome, never jams, takes several sheets, easy to clean, and leaves no mess. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Donald N. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Punch
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PUNCH. LIKE THE FACT THAT IT IS PLASTIC AS WE ARE IN THE TROPICS AND USUALLY MOST THINGS RUST. GLAD PURCHASED SAME
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Adair

customer_reviews.title: Used in busy office
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for a busy office. It works very well and we use it a lot. I would re-order one just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: This thing is an enormous beast and very slow to ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an enormous beast and very slow to actually "punch" It was too big for one of my offices so I tried to return it but I was denied by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: this to is a great puncher make sure you don't put more paper in then allowed will jam
customer_reviews.author: Eunice S. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: It is a great workhorse and it probably only breaks because we put ...
customer_reviews.text: In our office we go through one of these every 1-2 years depending on our usage. It is a great workhorse and it probably only breaks because we put too much paper in it. When used properly, we have no problems!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN G.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to any business to use
customer_reviews.text: Takes to long to punch holes and doesn't do many sheets at a time. Doesn't work the way it is advertised to work. I would not recommend this to any business to use. The manual ones are better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM IT IS HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and the product is not worth the money. Both hole punchers were inoperable after using only several times. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM IT IS HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Williams

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: We used this machine for maybe a month-month and a half and it started making a grinding noise. We have tried working with the manufacturer, GBC-ACCO Brands, to get it replaced. NO GO! Sent multiple emails and phone calls, received a few replies they will replace the machine but have not seen or heard anything!! DO NOT BUY THIS MACHINE!!! IT IS WORTHLESS! As is the manufacturers' customer service.
customer_reviews.author: AWARE I.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is our third electric hole punch for our office. There are less expensive ones on the market but this gives you the best quality for the relatively low price. We will be buying another one shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Des Hope

customer_reviews.title: The settings are easy to adjust and it punches my 30 page booklets ...
customer_reviews.text: It's bulky, but I use it to punch thick booklets for students to place in 3-ring binders. The settings are easy to adjust and it punches my 30 page booklets with the push of a button. If you have a hard time with manual 3-ring punches or you have a large quantity of items to hole punch, I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

product_meta.title: GBC 3230 Electric Paper Punch, Hole Punch, Adjustable, 2-3 Hole, 24 Sheet Punch Capacity, Gray (7704270), Small (1-24)
product_meta.description: Size:Small (1-24)The 3230 Electric punch simplifies your daily punching jobs. Simple Push button operation punches up to 24 sheets at a time. Jam reverse knob easily clears jams. A convenient chip drawer window lets you see easily when the tray needs emptying. Paper alignment guide assures perfect punching alignment. Limited one-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Punches up to 24 sheets at a time.
Adjustable to 2-hole or 3-hole standard punch patterns.
Paper alignment guide to ensure perfect punching.
Extra-large throat to accommodate oversized paper.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
